00036 #ifndef _spectrum_h
00037 #define _spectrum_h
00038 
00039 #include <fromsys.h>
00040 #include <defs.h>
00041 #include <banal.h>
00042 #include <splitfields.h>
00043 #include <datatypes.h>
00044 #include <bufvec.h>
00045 #include <cxops.h>
00046 #include <ringb.h>
00047 #include <lmadf.h>
00048 #include <fftw3.h>
00049 #include <window.h>
00050 
00051 #define SPEC_MAG        (0)
00052 #define SPEC_PWR        (1)
00053 #define SPEC_SEMI_RAW   (0)
00054 #define SPEC_PRE_FILT   (1)
00055 #define SPEC_POST_FILT  (2)
00056 #define SPEC_POST_AGC   (3)
00057 #define SPEC_POST_DET   (4)
00058 #define SPEC_PREMOD     (4)
00059 #define SPEC_LAST_TIME  (0)
00060 #define SPEC_LAST_FREQ  (1)
00061 
00062 typedef struct _spec_block
00063 {
00064     BOOLEAN flag,
00065             polyphase;
00066     Windowtype wintype;
00067     int buflen,
00068         fill,
00069         label,
00070         last,
00071         mask,
00072         planbits,
00073         rxk,
00074         scale,
00075         size,
00076         type;
00077     CXB accum,
00078         timebuf,
00079         freqbuf;
00080     REAL *output,
00081         *oscope,
00082         *window;
00083     fftwf_plan plan;
00084 } SpecBlock;
00085 
00086 extern void init_spectrum( SpecBlock * sb );
00087 extern void reinit_spectrum( SpecBlock * sb );
00088 extern void snap_spectrum( SpecBlock * sb, int label );
00089 extern void snap_scope( SpecBlock * sb, int label );
00090 extern void compute_spectrum( SpecBlock * sb );
00091 extern void finish_spectrum( SpecBlock * sb );
00092 
00093 #endif /*  */
